name: I SAW
description:
Artsy, weird, minimalistic exploration of a poem. Classic 2D-puzzle-platformer that makes you read while playing.

Based on Howl by Allen Ginsberg

Idea, Design and Animation

Sebastian Stricker

Music and Sounddesign

Olivier Haas

Code

Sebastian Stricker, Brackeys, Unity Technologies

All fonts from 1001fonts.com
